properties.areaDesc: Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Flat Tops; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Northwestern San Juan Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 1 at 2:14PM MST until February 4 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches
possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus, Grand and Battlement
Mesas, Flat Tops, Northwest San Juan Mountains and Southwest
San Juan Mountains.

* WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with patchy
blowing snow significantly reducing visibility, especially in
open areas. Expect all mountain passes to be affected with
occasional whiteout conditions possible due to the combination
of gusty winds and snowfall. A detailed map of the snowfall can
be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
